name: BoifunCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
BoifunCam skill is compatible with Wi-Fi cameras. Not all cameras using the BoifunCam app can utilize the BoifunCam skill. Prior to using this skill, kindly consult the sellers to confirm if your product supports Alexa.

To begin, please follow the steps outlined below:

1. Download the BoifunCam app from the App Store or Google Play. Connect your camera to the BoifunCam app and ensure it remains online and active.
2. Open the Alexa app and locate the BoifunCam Skill. Tap on "Enable Skill" to link your camera with your Alexa account. And then, locate your camera within the app.
3. Experiment with voice commands, such as, "Alexa, display the living room" to view live video feeds and monitor the well-being of your home.
